CustomField.formula: Case(Code_Number__c, "1","Low usage- FLT not used", "2","Toilet Overflowed", "3","Closed by Sanergy", "4","Toilet Locked", "5","Unscheduled", "6","School Closed", "7","Workman missed collection", "8","FLO request skip or special schedule", "9","Church or Institution Closed", "10","Research Toilet", "11","Other", "" )
CustomField.label: Description
